author: AddictedToStyrene
title: Glued together but still look great with additional Lego
review:
These bookends are made from Lego bricks, but glued together. The Lego logo is painted on. They are great bookends, and you can still add Lego to them.

Pros

  • They do the job - they are bookends.
  • You can add Lego to them. I made figures specific to the shelves I used them on. In my case, James Bond and Discworld Lego! (Now those are themes TLC could consider licensing!)

Cons

  • They are made from real Lego Bricks (red 2 x 3, 2 x 4 and 2 x 8, classic!) but glued together. You probably won't be able to make them into a billboard for your Lego town layout.
  • If you do add figures to them, be careful that they won't be knocked off by the books. Also remember that on the shelf, it might be hard to see the extra work you have put into them.

These bookends work fine, and would look best on a shelf big enough to show them off, while still holding up your collection of fine Lego reading.

Here are some Brickshelf pictures of how I used them.
